key_drivers: EIA crude inventory draw of -9.0M barrels (vs +1.65M expected) + US-Iran geopolitical risk driving CL bullish
BoJ hawkish tightening cycle + narrowing JPY-USD rate differential driving STRONG_BULLISH 6J
USD weakness (DXY -0.83% 1-month, -8.71% 1-year) supporting commodities and FX across the board
RBA surprise hike to 3.85% + ECB-Fed rate differential widening supporting M6E and 6A
Yield curve flattening (2s10s 0.74 -> 0.60) and accelerating GDPNow (3.1%) weighing on YM and RTY

fallbacks_used: TradingView for MOVE and SOX (primary Yahoo Finance unavailable)
News search for EIA inventory data
data_quality.notes: All data verified from primary or fallback sources. Gold spot price from WGC shows $5,108.26 (possibly in CNY or different denomination); GLD ETF at 468.62 implies ~$2,935/oz USD. Gold ETF flows data is January 2026 monthly (most recent available). Geopolitical risk assessment based on CBOE VIX page commentary re: US-Iran strikes.
